resources.string:
AndDaaven © 2010 S. Popper 

 Texts: Thanks to Moishe (Richard) Davidovichi for the text of daavening. Text of Megillat Esther from Wikisource. Text is licensed Creative Commons BY-SA 3.0 Text of fast day additions and kiddush levana from Siddur Bnei Ashkenaz via OpenSiddur. Text is licensed Creative Commons BY-SA 3.0
 Text of Zehut Yosef provided by Isaac Azose / Sephardic Traditions Foundation.
 Text of Nusach Ari/Chabad provided by Shmuel Gonzales to OpenSiddur. 

 Testing/Suggestions: Danny P., Craig E., Ari G., and many others. 

 Font: Ezra SIL by SIL International
 FreeMono by GNU FreeFont
 FreeSans by GNU FreeFont
 FreeSerif by GNU FreeFont
 Nachlieli CLM by The Culmus Project 

 Date Calculations: Date calculation code adapted from public domain C++ version of code written by Nachum Dershowitz and Edward M. Reingold in "Calendrical Calculations", published in Software---Practice & Experience, vol. 20, no. 9 (September, 1990), pp. 899--928. 

 Error Reporting: Error reporting library from the ACRA project.
Unexpected error, please send a report…
Please tap here to help fix the issue.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click \'OK\'.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
